description: Stores local state associated with an application.

id.description: The application which this local state is for.

key-value.description: Represents a key-value store for use in an application.

items.description: Represents a key-value pair in an application store.

type.description: \[tt\] value type. Value `1` refers to **bytes**, value `2` refers to **uint**

schema.description: Specifies maximums on the number of each type that may be stored.
